definition: the ceremonial act of clothing someone in the insignia of an office
details:
noun
- the ceremonial act of clothing someone in the insignia of an office
= synonyms: investiture
- the act of putting on robes or vestments
- the act of investing
= synonyms: investing
- outer layer or covering of an organ or part or organism
- the commitment of something other than money (time, energy, or effort) to a project with the expectation of some worthwhile result
= example: the commitment of something other than money (time, energy, or effort) to a project with the expectation of some worthwhile result
- money that is invested with an expectation of profit
= synonyms: investment funds
